about.projectDescription: Nestled along the serene shores of Dubai Creek and adjacent to the natural sanctuary of Ras Al Khor, Keturah Resort embodies the pinnacle of ultra-high-end luxury. This prestigious development is defined by its exquisite setting and meticulous craftsmanship, offering an unparalleled blend of opulence, wellness, and elegance with every detail designed for a refined lifestyle by turquoise waters.

amenities.text: Keturah Resort, featuring The Ritz-Carlton Residences, includes 12 Creekside Waterfront Mansions and exclusive Creekside Residences, making it the world's first fully wellness-certified resort. Amenities include private infinity pools, a luxurious spa, a state-of-the-art fitness center, gourmet dining, and landscaped gardens, providing a holistic and luxurious living experience.

content.title: Swimming pool
content.text: This inviting pool provides the perfect setting for a refreshing dip or unwinding under the sun.

content.title: Landscaped Area
content.text: It’s a beautiful outdoor space that combines lush greenery with elegant pathways and seating areas.

content.title: Fitness Centre
content.text: Featuring the latest equipment and workout options, it has everything for a full fitness routine.

content.title: Kids’ playground
content.text: The kids’ playground is a colorful, secure space designed for engaging and safe play.

content.title: Covered parking
content.text: With easy access and reliable coverage, it simplifies daily living and vehicle care.

content.title: Retail shops
content.text: This amenity enhances the living experience by bringing shopping closer to home.
Our installment schemas are devoid of any latent charges or unanticipated costs.
A 4% DLD (Dubai Land Department) fee applies to all real estate transactions in Dubai and must be paid in addition to the property's purchase price.

MAG Group Holding is a multinational conglomerate with diverse interests, including real estate, contracting, engineering, industrial trading, freight services, and hospitality. Among its flagship projects is the Emirates Financial Towers, a prominent twin-tower development in Dubai International Financial Centre.
